title: The Dream Viewing Party
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Haah~, what a wonderful story~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re right. I haven’t really seen many musical movies because, to me, musicals have always had a strong image of a stage play, but it was easy to digest and interesting<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, I’m glad that you took an interest in it, Maki-san! A stage play is great, but movies are also great in their own right, aren’t they<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah, I liked it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Aaah, I wish I can play a role like that one day.... That’s why I have to watch a lot more works and learn from them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You really love theater, huh. If you’d like, want to drop by my house? I think Mama has a few DVD of various stage plays<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eh! Can I!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yes, it’s not a big deal<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I’m so happy! Thank you, Maki-san~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wai-, it hurts! Geez!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
